name: study-abroad-branding-lp
description: 留学サポートブランディングLP - 10代の可能性を花開かせる留学サポートサービス

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run copy:assets
scripts.build:css: sass src/scss/main.scss dist/css/main.css --style compressed && postcss dist/css/main.css --use autoprefixer -r
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:css:dev && npm run build:js:dev && npm run copy:assets
scripts.build:js:dev: if not exist dist\js mkdir dist\js && copy src\js\main.js dist\js\main.js
scripts.watch: npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js
scripts.dev: npm run build:dev && npm run watch & npm run serve
scripts.copy:assets: xcopy src\images dist\images /E /I /Y && copy src\index.html dist\index.html
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run format

author: 留学サポートチーム
